title: [Help] : Salesforce vs Oracle vs Flipkart vs Kotak
content:
Education: B. Tech in CSE (Tier 1 College)
Years of Experience: 4.5
Prior Experience: OLA SDE-2 with Base 33 

**Salesforce**

Date of the Offer: 17th Feb 2025
Company: Salesforce 
Title/Level: MTS
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 31,00,000
Stock bonus: $48,000 (~42L for 4 years, 10.5L per year)
Bonus: Performance bonus (10%) ~3.1L

Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): **44.6L (1st year)**
31L (Base) + 10.5L (RSU) + 3.1L (Performance Bonus) 

Benefits:  https://salesforcebenefits.com/
Other details:
Tried hard for SMTS role , but they are saying that HM is not agreeing for SMTS .
Saying this is max they can offer for MTS


**Oracle**

Date of the Offer: 7th Feb 2025
Company: Oracle (non OCI)
Title/Level: SMTS
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 38,00,000
Stock bonus: $39,000 (~34L for 4 years, 13.6L 1st year) : vesting @[40% , 30% , 20% , 10% ] 

Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): **51.6L (1st year)**
38L (Base) + 13.6L (RSU) 

Benefits:  https://www.oracle.com/careers/culture/benefits/


**Flipkart**

Date of the Offer: 12th Feb 2025
Company: Flipkart 
Title/Level: SDE-2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 31,00,000
Bonus: Performance bonus ~3.1L
Joining Bonus - 3L
Relocation Bonus - 1.5L
ESOPS : 14L (Not considering into TC since it is paper money)

Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): **38.6L (1st year)**
31L (Base) + 3.1L + 3L + 1.5L


**Kotak**

Date of the Offer: 6th Feb 2025
Company: Flipkart 
Title/Level: SDE-2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 49,00,000
Joining Bonus - 3L

Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): **52L (1st year)**
49L (Base) + 3L 


Few Points : 
1. I was much more inclined towards Salsesforce but since they offered MTS , I'm not sure . Need your opinion
2. As of now I have not shared oracle's competing offer with Salesforce . Will it help in getting SMTS at Salesfoce given than my current fixed itself is more than SF base .
3. Which should be the ideal choice here, depending on Stability (want to be in same org for 3+ year ) >>> WLB >>  learning opportunity?
4. Also How are the chances of L1B visa transfer internally to US  between SF and Oracle . Which one has more chances of L1B transfer . [ IMPORTANT  decision maker ]

**Guys need your opnion**
Have been struggling for job switch from past 6 months . 
Will update a detailed journey of past 6 months once this is sorted .
